Package edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoardRenderer
    A BoardRenderer implementation is responsible for creating a String representation of the Board suitable for printing to stdout.
    GhostMovementAlgorithm
    A GhostMovementAlgorithm uses a Ghost's explored positions and other information a Ghost has to determine the next position on the map the Ghost should move towards.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    The Board class represents the environment for the simulation.
    BoardDirectionTest  
    BoardObject
    A BoardObject is the basic unit stored within the Board.
    BoardObjectTest  
    BoardObjectTypeTest  
    BoardPosition
    BoardPosition is a simple utility class storing row/column coordinates on the Board.
    BoardPositionTest  
    BoardTest  
    GameDriver
    GameDriver is responsible for instantiating the Game instance and requesting the number of ghosts the user would like in the simulation.
    GameDriverTest  
    GameTest  
    Ghost
    The Ghost is a specialized BoardObject that has the ability to look at its surroundings, communicate with other ghosts, and move around the board.
    GhostMovementAlgorithmTypeTest  
    GhostTest  
    GhostVisionBoardRenderer
    Renders the Board in "Ghost Vision" - which masks any spaces not explored by the ghosts in the game with a hash mark, except for the Target and the Ghosts themselves
    GhostVisionBoardRendererTest  
    InvisibleBoardRenderer  
    LinearGhostMovementAlgorithm
    The LinearGhostMovementAlgorithm scans linearly outward in all 8 directions from the Ghost and determines the nearest unexplored space in those directions.
    LinearGhostMovementAlgorithmTest  
    NearestGhostMovementAlgorithm
    The NearestGhostMovementAlgorithm chooses the nearest unexplored space to the Ghost and moves toward it.
    NearestGhostMovementAlgorithmTest  
    RandomGhostMovementAlgorithm
    The RandomGhostMovementAlgorithm chooses a random unexplored space and moves towards it.
    RandomGhostMovementAlgorithmTest  
    ScoredBoardPosition
    A ScoredBoardPosition
    ScoredBoardPositionTest  
    StandardBoardRenderer
    Renders the Board instance in the "standard" way, which means that each object is represented by its type representation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BoardDirection
    The BoardDirection class stores a pair of row/column offsets that indicate an ordinal direction on the Board grid.
    BoardObjectType
    BoardObjectType is an enumeration of the potential kinds of objects that may be stored on a Board grid.
    Game
    The Game class contains the core logic for our simulation.
    GhostMovementAlgorithmType
    The GhostMovementAlgorithmType is an enumeration factory for creating appropriate instances of the GhostMovementAlgorithm interface.
